devdoc.details: The contract is responsible for building and signing limit orders for the GnosisSafe. The contract uses oracles to adjust the order taking amount based on the volatility of the maker and taker assets.

params.extension: The extension data associated with the order.
params.makerAssetOracleParams: The oracle query parameters for the maker asset.
params.order: The order to be built and signed.
params.takerAssetOracleParams: The oracle query parameters for the taker asset.

devdoc.title: SafeOrderBuilder

buildAndSignOrder((uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Builds and signs a limit order for the GnosisSafe. The order is signed by the GnosisSafe and registered in the order registrator. The order taking amount is adjusted based on the volatility of the maker and taker assets.
